CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 27, 1962, page 14, reads: "Champagne to Newlyweds - As a token for the nice job which new bride Mrs. J. D. Lewis (the former Virginia Carter Lowe) did by serving as chairman for the Gays 'Champagne Sip,' Sunday, Mrs. Thelma Allen presented the couple with a bottle of champagne at the party Mr. Lewis accepts the gift. - Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Thelma Allen presenting a wrapped bottle of champagne to J. D. Lewis and Virginia Lewis, standing in domestic interior with Asian character over fireplace and wooden paneling
